CatDescriptText: Portion of accompanying article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 25, 1957, pg. A14 reads: "Sixth Cotillion Stuns Pittsburgh With Beauty - A sparking "Marine Magic" Theme shone brightly on the heads of 17 lovely young girls as they bowed and curtsied...danced and want through their paces at the sixth annual Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority's Debutante Cotillion, Saturday night, May 1, at the Penn-Sheraton Hotel..."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of four men, including possibly Obadiah Simms in center, and seven women, including Frankie Pace, second from left and daughter Frances Pace, third from left, posed in Penn Sheraton Hotel for the Alpha Kappa Alpha 1957 Cotillion
